name: Things Go BOOM!
description:
This is just a sandbox area to play with particles and explosion forces. Red boxes deployed in bulk will be time delayed, then detonate in the order they were placed.

WASD keys to move

Left Mouse button to fire an explosion. 

Right mouse button to create a physics test subject. This is a yellow cube that flies around based on the explosion forces applied. 

Press scroll wheel to instantiate a single instance of exploding shrapnel (time delayed). 

Hold F for a ton of instances of exploding shrapnel (time delayed).
